price: 6. Katakanlah (Muhammad), "Wahai orang-orang Yahudi! Jika kamu mengira bahwa kamulah kekasih Allah, bukan orang-orang yang lain, maka harapkanlah kematianmu, jika kamu orang-orang yang benar."
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوٓاْ إِن زَعَمۡتُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ لِلَّهِ مِن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُاْ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul yāayyuhā alladhīna hādū in zaʿamtum annakum awliyāu lillahi min dūni al-nāsi fatamannawū al-mawta in kuntum ṣādiqīna
